A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought that the cinematography and acting were amazing in the film. There were just too many plot holes\, too many plot points from episode 7 that were dropped or otherwise had unsatisfactory results and way too much wasted character potential. Not just Luke but Phasma\, Finn\, and Rose. I wanted to like this movie more than I did and it was the first time I have seen a Star Wars movie and was unsure how I felt about it.
